protectRights.linkAccessPoint: Let us know if you use this access point.
protectRights.linkTrip: Let us know if you have gone on this trip.

floodWarning.preamble: The Salinas River is at or approaching flood stage in at least one guage. Please stay clear of rising waters and stay safe.
floodWarning.links: Check Monterey County and SLO County emergency info

footer.by: By Kevin Miller. All content is offered under Creative Commons BY-NC 4.0.

windAlert.label: Afternoon wind
windAlert.warning: Consider getting an early start. The prevailing north-south winds pick up in the afternoon, and can make paddling difficult.

privatePropertyMessage.text: Parts of this area is near private land, be
privatePropertyMessage.link: aware of your rights and responsibilities

homepage.title: The Salinas River
homepage.subtitle: A recreation guide
homepage.ledeBold: This is a guide for enjoying the Salinas River.
homepage.lede: It flows for 170 miles south to north in Central California. It is home to beavers and bald eagles. Neighbors noodle on its banks for catfish, and cool off in its silty waters in the summer.
